title: kELe gOpi gOpAla
sahitya:
kELe gOpi gOpAla mADida balu tALiya gOkuladi


anupallavi

  tALelArave tavakadali kandage buddhi hELe krSNana karedu


caraNam 1    sari rAtriyoLu sarasarane manege bandu suridu pAl beNNegaLa 
urOjagaLige kara sirisi kaNgaLanu teredu nODuvane namma
    caraNam 2    gaNDanu maneyoLagiralu bandu krSNa bhaNDu mAtugaLa bahu 
tuNDatanalADi uddaNDa kaThiNakAya duNDu kucava piDida
    caraNam 3    .....vada mEliralu tA sIreya seLeva nODe 
Arivarendu vicArisi nODalu moreya bAgidane
    caraNam 4    kEriyoLage dadhimArutiralu krSNa sAri bandu mosara 
suragoNDu para nAriyara eredu tA ghOra rUpadi mereda
    caraNam 5    AdalEtake namma bAgilangaLadoLu bEDuva jala dainyadi 
nIDuve jala jalajAkSa bAbA ene mADuva rati embane
    caraNam 6    huDuganendu kaiya piDiya pOgalu namma uDemuDi piDida noDe 
paDedavaLige pELuve naDe ene mucca kODali tOruvane gOpi
    caraNam 7    maDadiyarellaru mIyutalire mai uDugeya tegedu koNDu 
saDagaradali bEDikoNNe vastragaLanu koDade aDavige naDeda
    caraNam 8    beNNeya tindu tammaNNage tA koTTu ciNNara baDiva nODe 
baNNisi namma bAyige beNNe toDeyuta beNNeya tindiremba
    caraNam 9    EnalOcane sarpavENi namma mane oNeyoLage pOguta 
kANadante cakrapANi nammoLu tanna trANava tOridane
  caraNam 10    padumanAbhanu purada caduriyarige tAnu madana shAstrava 
pELuta muddoLagiralavaroDeya baralu krSna kudureyanEridane
  caraNam 11    eSTu patrava koTTaru gOkuladoLu biTTavaniralAreve 
shrSTiyoLage sarvabhISTada purandara viTTala salahuvane
